links.title: You: ""That's for *me* to know, and *you*..."
links.text: "That's for *me* to know, and *you* to find out." (Wink at her.)

links.title: Washerwoman: ""You're trying to wink at me, aren'..."
links.text: "You're trying to wink at me, aren't you? I can't see, or did you forget that part?"

links.title: Washerwoman: ""Are you getting a reward for it at..."
links.text: "Are you getting a reward for it at least?"

links.title: You: ""No.""
links.text: "No."

links.title: Washerwoman: ""What? You're fetching someone's mi..."
links.text: "What? You're fetching someone's missing laundry *free of charge*? Do you not have anything better to do?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In fact, he does." The lieutenant..."
links.text: "In fact, he does." The lieutenant glances at his watch.

links.title: Washerwoman: ""None of my business, either way. H..."
links.text: "None of my business, either way. How you spend your hours is up to you..."

links.title: You: ""I just need to be needed.""
links.text: "I just need to be needed."

links.title: You: ""I just forgot to ask for a reward.""
links.text: "I just forgot to ask for a reward."

links.title: You: "(Lie.) "Yes.""
links.text: (Lie.) "Yes."

links.title: Washerwoman: ""Good for you. Can't expect to rece..."
links.text: "Good for you. Can't expect to receive help if you're not helpful in return. A fine arrangement, that."

links.title: Washerwoman: ""Anyhow, you might ask Lilienne if..."
links.text: "Anyhow, you might ask Lilienne if she's seen anything lately -- that girl's got a way of attracting lost and broken things."

links.title: You: ""There's honour in retrieving lost..."
links.text: "There's honour in retrieving lost things."

links.title: Washerwoman: ""Aye, laundry fetchers are some of..."
links.text: "Aye, laundry fetchers are some of the most *honourable* people I know." Her smile gleams like a freshly honed knife.

links.title: You: ""I'm afraid I can't comment -- Offi..."
links.text: "I'm afraid I can't comment -- Official police business."

links.title: Washerwoman: ""Oh, aye, must be *real* important..."
links.text: "Oh, aye, must be *real* important from the sound of it..."

links.title: You: ""One of the drunks lost his and I a..."
links.text: "One of the drunks lost his and I agreed to look for it."

links.title: Washerwoman: ""He probably pawned it for booze an..."
links.text: "He probably pawned it for booze and then forgot about it. You know how drunk men are..."

links.title: You: ""It's not for me. I'm on a *philoso..."
links.text: "It's not for me. I'm on a *philosophical* journey to fetch it for someone."

links.title: Washerwoman: ""Like a smart dog, yes?""
links.text: "Like a smart dog, yes?"

links.title: Empathy: "Like a dog, yes! Loyal and dependab..."
links.text: Like a dog, yes! Loyal and dependable.

links.title: Authority: "More like a slave to any master who..."
links.text: More like a slave to any master who tosses a bone your way.

links.title: You: ""Goodbye, I'm off." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Goodbye, I'm off." [Leave.]

links.title: Washerwoman: ""One thing. Officer, if you do find..."
links.text: "One thing. Officer, if you do find her, please go easy on her..." She looks around. The air is getting colder.

links.title: Empathy: "She really means it. It's an honest..."
links.text: She really means it. It's an honest plea.

links.title: Washerwoman: ""She's a good girl, whatever she's..."
links.text: "She's a good girl, whatever she's gotten herself mixed up in."

dialogueTree.title: Washerwoman: ""The policeman." She squints at you..."
dialogueTree.text: "The policeman." She squints at you. "What can our village do for you?"

dialogueTree.title: Washerwoman: "The old woman still hums her unknow..."
dialogueTree.text: The old woman still hums her unknown song. She opens her eyes to acknowledge your presence.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "There's a gap where the name of tha..."
links.text: There's a gap where the name of that song should be. You should ask her about it, right now!
